database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.tracker}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `pageId` int(10) NOT NULL, `userId` int(10) NOT NULL, `urlTitle` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `length` int(10) NOT NULL, `seeder` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `leecher` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `completed` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `infoHash` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `torrent` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `globalId` (`globalId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.tracker_peer}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `infoHash` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `peerId` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `port` int(10) NOT NULL, `uploaded` int(10) NOT NULL, `downloaded` int(10) NOT NULL, `left` int(10) NOT NULL, `event` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `key` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `client` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `priority` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `infoHashPeerId` (`infoHash`,`peerId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
